title: Desert Thieves
data: Desert Thieves is a 1914 American short silent Western film directed by Scott Sidney and featuring Charles Ray, Gretchen Lederer, Tsuru Aoki,[2][3] Frank Keenan and Ernest Swallow in lead roles. This article related to an American film of the 1910s (which would be a silent film) in the Western genre is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This article about a short silent film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
